author: Staff Reporter
text:
It will be open from 10.30 a.m. to 8.30 p.m. till tomorrow

‘Constructive-2016’, a three-day fair to showcase the latest trends and options available in interior and exterior designs and building materials, commenced at Tamukkam here on Friday.

According to the organisers, the idea was to provide exposure on cost-effective yet trendy developments in building materials to those who were already building or planning to construct homes.

“Even for buying electrical fixtures, people resort to old models, particularly in tier II cities like Madurai. However, there are so many smart solutions with sensors available at a cheaper cost,” said M. Elango, a senior manager with Innovative Trade Fairs, which is organising the exhibition.

He said that the fair would be helpful for those who wanted to build homes as well as commercial buildings. “We also expect many civil engineers, designers and architects to visit the exhibition,” he added. Eighty-two stalls have been put up by companies at the fair, which will be open from 10.30 a.m. to 8.30 p.m. till Sunday.
title: Construction fair begins
